price: 55. (Yuusuf) wuxuu yidhi: Iiga dhig (mas’uul) khasnadaha arlada (maaliyadda iyo qorsheynta). Waxaan anigu ahay xafide aamin ah, aqoon leh.
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
